title: Patch Chat with the Playtest Team - 7.1 Jungle Nerfs
body:
new "Minions" art created by inkinesss!

Hey guys! Welcome to Patch Chat, a Dev Corner thread we make to talk about our new patches every two weeks: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-71-notes . **Keep in mind that this is for discussing the current patch, not future content (e.g., Warwick)**

I'm Aesah on Riot's Playtest Team, a group of Diamond+ players who play with the new champions, reworks, balance tweaks, items, and map updates before they are released. It's our job to the test the changes that our designers come up with and ensure that we're introducing positive changes to LoL in terms of both balance and fun. We'll be watching this thread to answer as many questions as we can.

In 7.1, we're toning down how much agency junglers currently have over the game through decreasing the amount of experience they gain from the jungle. Some champions who have been overperforming that are receiving notable nerfs include Syndra, Ryze, Shyvana, Poppy, and Camille. Meanwhile, on the opposite end of the spectrum, we're buffing Draven, Kalista, Lucian, and Talon. The only item changed in this patch is the Zz'rot Portal, which is getting a reduced range to discourage leaving it alone far away in the back and forgetting about it. There is still a lot of work to be done but these some first steps to delivering an excellent Season 7 experience!

All of us on the Playtest Team are avid gamers so feel free to talk to us as fellow LoL players!

Adam "Afic" Cohen
Ben “Cezium” Burkhardt
Don “Aesah” Ding
Nicolas “Gleeb” Haddad

Bao “Bao” Lam
Robert “ROBERTxLEE” Lee

As a Singed main, the Zz'rot nerfs seem too harsh. Zz'rot is a core item on Singed and this is definitely going to hurt. The voidspawn don't even reach from one outer turret to the other. What if every fourth empowered voidspawn was able to go a bit farther?

About Anivia:

Is the R-flash particle added to her ult considered a net neutral change?
(I'm assuming it flashes for everyone so enemies now know to gtfo and players can better tell when E will be thrown onto a frosted target)

Good to hear.  
Ty for insight.  {{item:3680}}

So Ryze nerfs: 

Obviously he's overperforming at the highest levels, but he's really struggling in the hands of most players. Does the balance team see this as a problem, or are you happy to let him be balanced for high level play and weak for most players?

That is generally always considered a problem by designers because it means that the character is very difficult to balance. I don't know if ChampUp has any thoughts about Ryze, but I know they've felt that the reworked Vladimir suffers from similar issues.

Overall, I liked just about everything I saw in this patch except for one small detail. Halving Poppy's snap-cast damage in half was good, but was killing the AD ratio necessary as well? She builds full tank and this officially kills anybody playing around with a full damage build looking to assassinate someone for fun.

As far as the jungle goes, was still able to hit level 3 after 3 camps so it doesn't feel like the biggest nerf and feels pretty balanced for a first clear. For Shyvana, the only noticeable impact I felt was when clearing the raptor camp which you take a bit more damage at.

> She builds full tank and this officially kills anybody playing around with a full damage build looking to assassinate someone for fun.

Unfortunately off-builds often get nerfed as a result of balance changes. It's just a sad reality we live in ;_;

Draven has always been a higher risk with higher reward champion with the new mages in the bot lane meta doing better than ADCs what is the point of continuing on as an ADC main when I could just go play another lane and have a lot more success. we have always been susceptible to ganks but with the increased EXP/Gold Gain from jungle and how far ADCs have fallen off its slowly becoming a useless roll. early/mid game we have little to nothing to pop off especially when you've got {{champion:115}} Ziggs taking towers/doing more damage than any ADC and {{champion:90}} absolutely destroying us in poke. any plans on reworking ADC because in the current meta ADC is ridiculous. I don't believe in the death threats but it seems Bot lane has literally been brushed under the rug and made the be the jungles easy +300...
